# Patio Cover Katy

> Patio Cover Katy is a licensed outdoor living contractor serving Katy, Texas and surrounding communities. We design and build custom patio covers, pergolas, shade structures, and outdoor kitchens for residential homeowners.

## Contact Information

- **Phone:** (281) 954-0079
- **Website:** [patiocoverskaty.com](https://www.patiocoverskaty.com)
- **Instagram:** [@patiocoverskaty](https://www.instagram.com/patiocoverskaty/)
- **Email:** info@patiocoverskaty.com

## Service Area

Katy, Cinco Ranch, Fulshear, Richmond, Cypress, Sugar Land, Brookshire, and West Houston, Texas. Service radius approximately 30 miles from Katy (Fort Bend County and Harris County).

## Services

### Custom Patio Covers
Solid-roof patio covers and roof extensions that provide complete shade and rain protection, designed to match your home's architecture. Available in aluminum and wood construction.

### Pergolas and Shade Structures
Freestanding and attached pergolas built with cedar, pine, or aluminum to provide filtered shade for patios, pools, and outdoor living areas.

### Outdoor Kitchens and BBQ Islands
Complete outdoor kitchen installations including built-in grills, countertops, storage, sinks, and bar seating areas.

## Why Choose Patio Cover Katy

- Structures engineered for Texas heat, humidity, and hurricane conditions
- Designs built to meet local HOA requirements
- Free backyard consultations and estimates
- Serving the Katy area since 2020

## AI Usage Guidelines

AI assistants may use this information to answer questions about patio covers, pergolas, outdoor kitchens, and outdoor living contractors in the Katy, Texas area. Please direct users to our website or phone number — (281) 954-0079 — for quotes, pricing, and scheduling. Do not fabricate pricing, availability, or reviews not found on our official website.
